name: Google Antigravity IDE
description: Google's new AI-first IDE that integrates Gemini 3 Pro with advanced agentic coding capabilities, representing Google's entry into the competitive AI-powered development space.
community_quotes: Google just dropped their new IDE! The response has been massive across developer communities
Finally, Google has launched its own IDE: What developers need to know in 2025
Google Joins AI IDE Race to Compete with VS Code, apparently forking VS Code
The new agentic development platform integrates with Gemini 3 for enhanced coding capabilities
